sentence.Network_en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentence.Network_cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentence.Network_en: Adam stumbles on, leaving a trail of devastation in his wake.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚当蹒跚而行，沿路留下毁坏的痕迹。

sentence.Network_en: Representatives from across the horse industry will attend the meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个赛马业的代表都将参加这次会议。

RelatedPhrase.word: Mercedes trailed behind the horse cart
